result.markdown:
--- title: typecast --- ## Atomic and List Type Casting With Names and Dimensions Preserved {.unnumbered} ### Description Type casting usually strips away attributes of objects.
The functions provided here preserve dimensions, dimnames, and names, which may be more convenient for arrays and array-like objects.

The functions are as follows:
  • as_bool(): converts object to atomic type logical (TRUE, FALSE, NA).
  • as_int(): converts object to atomic type integer.
  • as_dbl(): converts object to atomic type double (AKA numeric).
  • as_chr(): converts object to atomic type character.
  • as_cplx(): converts object to atomic type complex.
  • as_raw(): converts object to atomic type raw.
  • as_list(): converts object to recursive type list.
as_num() is an alias for as_dbl().
as_str() is an alias for as_chr().

See also typeof.

### Usage 
as_bool(x, ...)

as_int(x, ...)

as_dbl(x, ...)

as_num(x, ...)

as_chr(x, ...)

as_str(x, ...)

as_cplx(x, ...)

as_raw(x, ...)

as_list(x, ...)
### Arguments
x an R object.
... further arguments passed to or from other methods.
### Value The converted object.

### Examples ::: {.cell} ```{.r .cell-code} library("broadcast") # matrix example ==== x <- matrix(sample(-1:28), ncol = 5) colnames(x) <- month.name[1:5] rownames(x) <- month.abb[1:6] names(x) <- c(letters[1:20], LETTERS[1:10]) print(x) ``` ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout} ``` January February March April May Jan 1 14 18 3 12 Feb 5 23 9 6 4 Mar 16 27 20 -1 0 Apr 26 22 21 24 28 May 13 25 15 7 8 Jun 17 11 19 2 10 attr(,"names") [1] "a" "b" "c" "d" "e" "f" "g" "h" "i" "j" "k" "l" "m" "n" "o" "p" "q" "r" "s" [20] "t" "A" "B" "C" "D" "E" "F" "G" "H" "I" "J" ``` ::: ```{.r .cell-code} as_bool(x) ``` ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout} ``` January February March April May Jan TRUE TRUE TRUE TRUE TRUE Feb TRUE TRUE TRUE TRUE TRUE Mar TRUE TRUE TRUE TRUE FALSE Apr TRUE TRUE TRUE TRUE TRUE May TRUE TRUE TRUE TRUE TRUE Jun TRUE TRUE TRUE TRUE TRUE attr(,"names") [1] "a" "b" "c" "d" "e" "f" "g" "h" "i" "j" "k" "l" "m" "n" "o" "p" "q" "r" "s" [20] "t" "A" "B" "C" "D" "E" "F" "G" "H" "I" "J" ``` ::: ```{.r .cell-code} as_int(x) ``` ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout} ``` January February March April May Jan 1 14 18 3 12 Feb 5 23 9 6 4 Mar 16 27 20 -1 0 Apr 26 22 21 24 28 May 13 25 15 7 8 Jun 17 11 19 2 10 attr(,"names") [1] "a" "b" "c" "d" "e" "f" "g" "h" "i" "j" "k" "l" "m" "n" "o" "p" "q" "r" "s" [20] "t" "A" "B" "C" "D" "E" "F" "G" "H" "I" "J" ``` ::: ```{.r .cell-code} as_dbl(x) ``` ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout} ``` January February March April May Jan 1 14 18 3 12 Feb 5 23 9 6 4 Mar 16 27 20 -1 0 Apr 26 22 21 24 28 May 13 25 15 7 8 Jun 17 11 19 2 10 attr(,"names") [1] "a" "b" "c" "d" "e" "f" "g" "h" "i" "j" "k" "l" "m" "n" "o" "p" "q" "r" "s" [20] "t" "A" "B" "C" "D" "E" "F" "G" "H" "I" "J" ``` ::: ```{.r .cell-code} as_chr(x) ``` ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout} ``` January February March April May Jan "1" "14" "18" "3" "12" Feb "5" "23" "9" "6" "4" Mar "16" "27" "20" "-1" "0" Apr "26" "22" "21" "24" "28" May "13" "25" "15" "7" "8" Jun "17" "11" "19" "2" "10" attr(,"names") [1] "a" "b" "c" "d" "e" "f" "g" "h" "i" "j" "k" "l" "m" "n" "o" "p" "q" "r" "s" [20] "t" "A" "B" "C" "D" "E" "F" "G" "H" "I" "J" ``` ::: ```{.r .cell-code} as_cplx(x) ``` ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout} ``` January February March April May Jan 1+0i 14+0i 18+0i 3+0i 12+0i Feb 5+0i 23+0i 9+0i 6+0i 4+0i Mar 16+0i 27+0i 20+0i -1+0i 0+0i Apr 26+0i 22+0i 21+0i 24+0i 28+0i May 13+0i 25+0i 15+0i 7+0i 8+0i Jun 17+0i 11+0i 19+0i 2+0i 10+0i attr(,"names") [1] "a" "b" "c" "d" "e" "f" "g" "h" "i" "j" "k" "l" "m" "n" "o" "p" "q" "r" "s" [20] "t" "A" "B" "C" "D" "E" "F" "G" "H" "I" "J" ``` ::: ```{.r .cell-code} as_raw(x) ``` ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout} ``` January February March April May Jan 01 0e 12 03 0c Feb 05 17 09 06 04 Mar 10 1b 14 00 00 Apr 1a 16 15 18 1c May 0d 19 0f 07 08 Jun 11 0b 13 02 0a attr(,"names") [1] "a" "b" "c" "d" "e" "f" "g" "h" "i" "j" "k" "l" "m" "n" "o" "p" "q" "r" "s" [20] "t" "A" "B" "C" "D" "E" "F" "G" "H" "I" "J" ``` ::: ```{.r .cell-code} ################################################################################ # factor example ==== x <- factor(month.abb, levels = month.abb) names(x) <- month.name print(x) ``` ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout} ``` January February March April May June July August Jan Feb Mar Apr May Jun Jul Aug September October November December Sep Oct Nov Dec Levels: Jan Feb Mar Apr May Jun Jul Aug Sep Oct Nov Dec ``` ::: ```{.r .cell-code} as_bool(as_int(x) > 6) ``` ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout} ``` January February March April May June July August FALSE FALSE FALSE FALSE FALSE FALSE TRUE TRUE September October November December TRUE TRUE TRUE TRUE ``` ::: ```{.r .cell-code} as_int(x) ``` ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout} ``` January February March April May June July August 1 2 3 4 5 6 7 8 September October November December 9 10 11 12 ``` ::: ```{.r .cell-code} as_dbl(x) ``` ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout} ``` January February March April May June July August 1 2 3 4 5 6 7 8 September October November December 9 10 11 12 ``` ::: ```{.r .cell-code} as_chr(x) ``` ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout} ``` January February March April May June July August "Jan" "Feb" "Mar" "Apr" "May" "Jun" "Jul" "Aug" September October November December "Sep" "Oct" "Nov" "Dec" ``` ::: ```{.r .cell-code} as_cplx(x) ``` ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout} ``` January February March April May June July August 1+0i 2+0i 3+0i 4+0i 5+0i 6+0i 7+0i 8+0i September October November December 9+0i 10+0i 11+0i 12+0i ``` ::: ```{.r .cell-code} as_raw(x) ``` ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout} ``` January February March April May June July August 01 02 03 04 05 06 07 08 September October November December 09 0a 0b 0c ``` ::: :::
